mapper.select: select cn_activity_id id,cn_activity_title title,cn_activity_body body,cn_activity_end_time endDate from cn_activity where STRCMP(date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),cn_activity_end_time)<=0

select cn_activity_id activityId,cn_note_activity_id activityNoteId,cn_note_id noteId, cn_note_activity_up up,cn_note_activity_down down, cn_note_activity_title title,cn_note_activity_body body from cn_note_activity where cn_activity_id=#{activityId}
